enginesDescription.node: change back to >=14.15.1 once vercel build is enhanced

dependenciesDescription.bs-platform: This a regular dependency because the included standard libraries are used during runtime
dependenciesDescription.next-mdx-remote: Allows for directly invoking mdxjs markdown conversion during nextjs data fetching
dependenciesDescription.next-transpile-modules: Used to convert rescript libraries from commonjs to es6 in nextjs builds

scriptsDescription.next:start: prefer using express or another server with the output of next:export instead of next:start

devDependenciesDescription.postcss-cli: Only used when manually debugging CSS generation. True postcss version is determined by next version
devDependenciesDescription.yarn: yarn is installed manually initially to perform install, after that, this version is referenced
